mapper.select: select w.waho_id from whc_order o left join whc_warehouse_cell wc on o.wahoce_id = wc.wahoce_id left join whc_warehouse w on wc.waho_id = w.waho_id where o.order_id =#{orderId}

select act.activity_id,st.showtime_timefrom,st.showtime_timeto,con.content_id,sr.showrange_wahoid,con.content_imageurl,con.content_url from adv_activity act left join adv_content con on con.activity_id = act.activity_id left join adv_position posi on act.position_id = posi.position_id left join adv_showrange sr on sr.activity_id = act.activity_id left join adv_showtime st on act.activity_id = st.activity_id where posi.position_code = '1' and act.activity_ifdefault='1'

select act.activity_id,st.showtime_timefrom,st.showtime_timeto,con.content_id,sr.showrange_wahoid,con.content_imageurl,con.content_url from adv_activity act left join adv_content con on con.activity_id = act.activity_id left join adv_position posi on act.position_id = posi.position_id left join adv_showrange sr on sr.activity_id = act.activity_id left join adv_showtime st on act.activity_id = st.activity_id where posi.position_code = '2' and act.activity_ifdefault='1'

select act.activity_id,st.showtime_timefrom,st.showtime_timeto,con.content_id,sr.showrange_wahoid,con.content_imageurl,con.content_url from adv_activity act left join adv_content con on con.activity_id = act.activity_id left join adv_position posi on act.position_id = posi.position_id left join adv_showrange sr on sr.activity_id = act.activity_id left join adv_showtime st on act.activity_id = st.activity_id where sr.showrange_wahoid =#{wahoId} and posi.position_code = '1' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=st.showtime_dateto and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')<= st.showtime_dateto

select act.activity_id,st.showtime_timefrom,st.showtime_timeto,con.content_id,sr.showrange_wahoid,con.content_imageurl,con.content_url from adv_activity act left join adv_content con on con.activity_id = act.activity_id left join adv_position posi on act.position_id = posi.position_id left join adv_showrange sr on sr.activity_id = act.activity_id left join adv_showtime st on act.activity_id = st.activity_id where sr.showrange_wahoid =#{wahoId} and posi.position_code = '2' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=st.showtime_dateto and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')<= st.showtime_dateto
